level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1702(a) of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-376, July 24, 2000, 47 DCR 6574).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1702(a) of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13- 438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1102 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-308.07.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-259, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-301.01.
For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-301.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title: Section 1101 of D.C. Law 18-223 provided that subtitle K of title I of the act may be cited as the "Contract Appeals Board Amendment Act of 2010".
